title: U&lc magazine
content: I have 40 copies of U&lc magazine, ranging from Voume 4, #4 (December, 1977) through Volume 19, #1 (Spring 1992). I can't bring myself to throw them out. Do they have any value? Is anyone interested in them?
author: pcrook

comments.content: This sounds cool! I am a student (aka I have no money) so if nobody wants to pay you for them I would love to have them! I could pay for postage...

They do have value. You could offer them on Ebay, or contact the Rob Saunders at the Letterform Archive in San Francisco. He probably has a full set already but might know of someone looking for them.
Thanks. I'll keep that in mind!
